title: AbstractSWEIdentifiable
description: Base substitution groups for all SWE Common objects with identification metadata

extension.title: extension
extension.description: Extension slot for future extensions to this standard.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifier of the data component. It can be used to globally identify a particular component of the dataset, a process input/output or a universal constant

label.title: label
label.description: Textual label for the data component . This is often used for displaying a human readable name for a dataset field or a process input/output

description.title: description
description.description: Textual description (i.e. human readable) of the data component usually used to clarify its nature
